user_input: Use the Joule Model. Split the Nuclear generators in france into 2 objects one in north one in south keep the object name length to 4 characters
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operations in the Joule Model, adhering to PLEXOS object, membership, and naming constraints.

tasks.description: Read all Nuclear Generator objects in France within the Joule Model.
tasks.strategy_a: filters: model=Joule; category=Electricity; class=Generator; fuel=Nuclear; geography=France
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select all existing objects in Joule Model under Electricity > Generator with Fuel=Nuclear whose geography/memberships map to France.

tasks.description: Create a new Generator object in the Joule Model for the northern France split with a 4-character name.
tasks.strategy_a: naming: 4-character code; enforce uniqueness; scope=France North; class=Generator; fuel=Nuclear
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', create a new Electricity > Generator object (Fuel=Nuclear) in the Joule Model representing the northern France split. The object name must be exactly 4 characters.

tasks.description: Create a new Generator object in the Joule Model for the southern France split with a 4-character name.
tasks.strategy_a: naming: 4-character code; enforce uniqueness; scope=France South; class=Generator; fuel=Nuclear
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', create a new Electricity > Generator object (Fuel=Nuclear) in the Joule Model representing the southern France split. The object name must be exactly 4 characters.

tasks.description: Assign the new northern split Generator to the France North region/zone.
tasks.strategy_a: membership_target: Region/Zone=France North; object=North split nuclear generator
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', add the appropriate Region/Zone membership to the newly created northern France Nuclear Generator object: Region/Zone = France North.

tasks.description: Assign the new southern split Generator to the France South region/zone.
tasks.strategy_a: membership_target: Region/Zone=France South; object=South split nuclear generator
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', add the appropriate Region/Zone membership to the newly created southern France Nuclear Generator object: Region/Zone = France South.
